name: koa-no-cache
description: no cache for some paths or types

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R dot -t 500 test/*.js
scripts.test-travis: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot -t 500 test/*.js

author: haoxin
